mapper.select: SELECT card.*,attribute.Attr_IMG,attribute.Attr_Name, card_init.*,card_max.*, fighter.*, opus.Opus_IMG,opus.Opus_Name from attribute,attr_card, card,card_clothing_fighter,card_init,card_max, fighter, opus,opus_card WHERE attribute.Attr_ID = attr_card.AC_AID AND attr_card.AC_CID = card.Card_ID AND card.Card_ID = card_clothing_fighter.C_C_F_Card AND card.Card_ID = card_init.Card_ID AND card.Card_ID = card_max.Card_ID AND card_clothing_fighter.C_C_F_Fighter = fighter.Fighter_ID AND card.Card_ID = opus_card.O_Card_CID AND opus.Opus_ID = opus_card.O_Card_OID AND card.Card_ID = #{id}
